{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Airbrushing {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Airbrushing An airbrush is a small, air-operated tool that sprays various media, most often paint but also ink and dye, and foundation by a process of nebulization. Spray painting developed from the airbrush and is considered to employ a type of airbrush. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Airbrush)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
